/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban environment. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and the blue of the sky standing out against the more muted tones of the buildings.
